Description:
Detects a possible process memory dump that uses the white-listed Citrix TrolleyExpress.exe filename as a way to dump the lsass process memory

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Process Access via TrolleyExpress Exclusion
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%\trolleyexpress 7%' or command like '%\trolleyexpress 8%' or command like '%\trolleyexpress 9%' or command like '%\trolleyexpress.exe 7%' or command like '%\trolleyexpress.exe 8%' or command like '%\trolleyexpress.exe 9%' or command like '%\trolleyexpress.exe -ma %') or (process_path like '%\trolleyexpress.exe' and  not (original_file_name like '%ctxinstall%' or original_file_name = 'null')))
